text: fqal ruasa' alkufr min qwmh: 'iinak last bmalak wlknk bshr, fkyf 'uwhy 'iilayk min dwnna? wama narak atabaeak 'iilaa aladhin hum asaflna wa'iinama atabaeuk min ghyr tufakir wala rwyat, wama naraa lakum ealayna min fadl fi rizq wala mal lmma dakhaltum fi dinikum hdha, bal naetaqid 'anakum kadhibun fima tddaewn
